metadata.title: Termitomyces pakistanensis, a new mushroom species from Pakistan based on scanning electron microscopy and ITS-rDNA barcoding

authors_verbatim: Razaq Abdul; Ishaq Aamna; Ilyas Sobia; Niaz Shereen; Sadia Sehrish

labels.rationale:
Taxonomic mycology study describing a new 
mushroom species from 
Pakistan. 

SEM used for spores; 

affiliations with UVAS Pattoki, Lahore College for Women, and Peshawar University. 

No CMCA involvement.
